    • Method Detail

      • HookExtend

        public static void HookExtend(SimHookBase whom)
        Use this to link simulator actions to Firmata.
        Parameters:
        whom - An instance of a subclass of SimHookBase

      • IsOpen

        public boolean IsOpen()
        Current status of the FakeFirmata library, =true if successfully open.
        Returns:
        true if successfully open, false if failed or closed

      • pinMode

        public void pinMode(int pin,
                    byte mode)
        Sets the mode of the specified pin (INPUT or OUTPUT).
        Parameters:
        pin - The arduino pin.
        mode - Mode Arduino.OUTPUT or Arduino.SERVO (Arduino.INPUT, Arduino.ANALOG or Arduino.PWM not supported)

      • digitalWrite

        public void digitalWrite(int pin,
                         byte value)
        Write to a digital pin that has been toggled to output mode with pinMode() method.
        Parameters:
        pin - The digital pin to write to.
        value - Value either Arduino.LOW or Arduino.HIGH.

      • servoWrite

        public void servoWrite(int pin,
                       int angle)
        [For] controlling [a] servo. Maximum input of 1 byte numbers.
        Parameters:
        pin - Servo output pin. Port 9 for steering

      • Open

        public void Open()
        Opens the serial port connection, should it be required. By default the port is opened when the object is first created.

        Note that JSSC does not recover gracefully from a failure to close, so a subsequent Open() will fail until the system is rebooted.

      • Close

        public void Close()
        Closes the serial port.

        Note that JSSC does not recover gracefully from a failure to close, so a subsequent Open() will fail until the system is rebooted.
